prerequisite.name: Checking xTuple Edition
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a PostBooks database.

prerequisite.name: Checking for too-old xTuple ERP database version
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a 4.4+ database.

prerequisite.name: Checking for too-new xTuple ERP database version
prerequisite.message: This package may not be applied to a database newer than 4.11.0Beta.

prerequisite.name: Checking if plv8 extension is installed
prerequisite.query: SELECT exists(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_extension WHERE extname = 'plv8');
prerequisite.message: The PostgreSQL extension, plv8, must be installed on your database. See: https://github.com/xtuple/xtuple/wiki/Installing-PLv8

prerequisite.name: Checking for plv8 setup in postgresql.conf
prerequisite.message: Please add the line "plv8.start_proc = 'xt.js_init'" to your postgresql.conf and restart the database server.

prerequisite.name: Checking for mobile-enabled schemas
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'xm');
prerequisite.message: This package may not be applied to a mobile-enabled database. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.

prerequisite.name: Checking for Comment Type Source consistency - cmnttype
prerequisite.message: There are records in the cmnttypesource table with no matching cmnttype entries. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.

prerequisite.name: Checking for Comment Type Source consistency - source
prerequisite.message: There are records in the cmnttypesource table with no matching source entries. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.
